label: TLPT
name: Threat-Led Pen Test
frequency: At least every 3 years (frequency may be adjusted by CA)
scope: Several or all critical or important functions; performed on live production systems
tester_requirements: Must use external testers at least every third test; internal testers require supervisory approval; threat intelligence provider must always be external
authority_role: Scope must be validated by competent authorities; authorities provide an attestation of completion for mutual recognition.
